Title: Relates to medical use of psilocybin; appropriation
Summary: Relates to medical use of psilocybin; establishes a psilocybin assisted therapy grant program; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add Art 33 Title 5-B §§3369-aa - 3369-jj, Pub Health L; add §97-uuuu, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the state finance law, in relation to medical use of psilocybin; and making an appropriation therefor
